metadata.synopsis: Minthara and Lae'zel explore a cursed forest

3.speaker: Lae'zel
3.text: Difficult terrain, cursed or not. Gith dragon-riders prefer flat land and open skies.
3.context: NodeContext: describing this bitterly - she hates Ketheric

1.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
1.text: Ketheric's undead legions carve paths through the foliage when they pass. It grows back stronger though.
1.context: NodeContext: describing this bitterly - she hates Ketheric

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: A tedious labour well suited to the undead.
0.context: NodeContext: sneering - she has no respect for surface-dwellers (meaning those are not from the underdark)

2.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
2.text: Tedious labour does not only suit the dead. Plenty of surface-dwellers are suitable for little else.
2.context: NodeContext: sneering - she has no respect for surface-dwellers (meaning those are not from the underdark)
